Nagardola synopsis (Story)

A sentimental portrayal about the incidents of a family. Anindya & Nandini Banerji travel to Sankarpur for a change with their children Nisha (Samata Das) & Raja (Vicky). There Nisha makes friendship with the rational & sensitive MPhil student Samadrita (Indrani). She finds an elder sister in Samadrita, protective & sceptic. The family returns to Kolkata after a day. Nandini (Rupa Ganguly) is an eccentric, impatient & unscrupulous woman who is absolutely obssassed with the legacy of her father. She becomes a misfit everywhere, at home and also at her work place.
